## Events.BumpEvent type

Type of events that cause objects to be bumped back into the visible portion of the workspace.

Not to be confused with bumping so that disconnected connections do not appear connected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BumpEvent = BlockCreate | BlockMove | CommentCreate | CommentMove | CommentResize;
```
**References:** [BlockCreate](./blockly.events_namespace.blockcreate_class.md)<!-- -->, [BlockMove](./blockly.events_namespace.blockmove_class.md)<!-- -->, [CommentCreate](./blockly.events_namespace.commentcreate_class.md)<!-- -->, [CommentMove](./blockly.events_namespace.commentmove_class.md)<!-- -->, [CommentResize](./blockly.events_namespace.commentresize_class.md)
